Name: Sameera Group
description: This group is called Sameera, which consists of four ladies who live in Hodeidah, Yemen. Samira is a 26-year-old single woman. She started a business selling fruits and vegetables with support from her brother. She is a responsible woman, and she works hard to earn daily income. Her business is not going well, due to a lack of money. To expand her business, she has applied for a loan of 20,000 YER from AMB. She will use the loan to buy vegetables and fruits for resale.
